body_html:
OK, looks like __del__ isn't called because there's a cycle and ref count never goes to zero.
sess._default_session.args["default"] points back to sess (args are filled in here), but there's no such cycle when using tf.Session

Running gc.collect detects cycles and cleans them up.
body_text:
OK, looks like __del__ isn't called because there's a cycle and ref count never goes to zero.
sess._default_session.args["default"] points back to sess (args are filled in here), but there's no such cycle when using tf.Session
Running gc.collect detects cycles and cleans them up.
body:
OK, looks like `__del__` isn't called because there's a cycle and ref count never goes to zero.
`sess._default_session.args["default"]` points back to sess (args are filled in [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/03619fab3f4dd6f28b67418455a953b0fccdd9bf/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py#L4507)), but there's no such cycle when using `tf.Session`

Running `gc.collect` detects cycles and cleans them up.
